ep4.title: A New Hope
ep4.summaryLong: A young farmboy sets off for adventure with a pair of stolen robots and an old man who has been watching him his entire life.

ep5.title: The Empire Strikes Back
ep5.summaryLong: This is the one with the AT-ATs.  That's all you need to know.

ep6.title: Return of the Jedi
ep6.summaryLong: Yoda, sick of Luke's questions, just gives up and dies.

ep7.title: The Force Awakens
ep7.summaryLong: If you liked A NEW HOPE, you'll like this

ep8.title: The Last Jedi
ep8.summaryLong: Honestly, I don't know what everyone is complaining about.  The idea of anyone can be embued with the Force was such a great idea.  Yeah, the casino planet was junk, but they blew a ship through a Star Destroyer!

ep9.title: The Rise of Skywalker
ep9.summaryLong: Tell me you didn't have a plan for your trilogy without telling me you didn't have a plan for your trilogy.
